assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The sample collection and the experimental procedures were based on the favorable opinion of the Ethics Committee, Hospital District of Northern Savo (decision number 77/2017). An informed consent was obtained from all the subjects prior to sample collection.
